text: Frank Theodore "Ted" Levine (born May 29, 1957) is an American actor. He is known for his roles as Buffalo Bill in The Silence of the Lambs and as Captain Leland Stottlemeyer in the television series Monk. In 2018, he starred as Ken Wheatley in Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom. He is the voice of Monstar Bang in Space Jam: A New Legacy. == Filmography == *Space Jam: A New Legacy (Monstar Bang) - Post-production ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Actors from Ohio Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Actors from Oak Park, Illinois
title: Ted Levine
